body.para: SRAM data includes NC parameters, tool offset data, pitch error compensation data, common macro variables and other data. SRAM data can be used for the following purpose.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:5px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:5px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;
li.text: To restore the machine condition after a CNC power (battery) in SRAM is lost.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;
li.text: When some serious problems occurred, it may be necessary to send SRAM data to Makino service representative to confirm NC internal processing status.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:14px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:4px; margin-left:48px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:6px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:6px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: Power Off the machine. Insert a memory card into the PCMCIA port on the main operator panel.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:6px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: Turn On the main circuit breaker.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:6px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: keys on the MDI panel. The main system boot screen is displayed.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:6px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: keys on the MDI panel to navigate the menu selection. Select “7. SRAM DATA UTILITY”.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:6px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: key on the MDI panel to enter the selection.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:6px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ;

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: A file with default name “SRAM_BAK.001” is created in the memory card.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ;
li.text: If the data can not be save entirely into a single memory card, “SET MEMORY CARD NO. 002” message is displayed. With the power still On, insert the second memory card and press the

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ;

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: Select “4. END” and then press the
key to go back to main system boot screen.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: Select “1. END” to end the backup operation and NC boots up normally.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:62px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: This completes the SRAM data backup procedure.
